content.question: The graph shows the velocity of an object <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. What is the distance traveled by the object from <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math> to <math alttext="t equals 7.0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7.0</mn><mspace width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
